Shoot Through Inside Miku's Rabbit Hole!

sight that allows you shoot through without getting blocked by cramped stripes. use the tip of heart crevice (inside)!

artist credit : alllisso
sight line art : Kloire


#anime #sight #usersight #miku #rabbithole #miku #vocaloid

Minimalistic sight with SOPMOD2 from Girls' Frontline with two language options.

It was made in the TurboWarp browser program.

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTION:
1. Download the Zip-file and unzip it.
2. Go to the root folder of the game, find the folder Usersights and paste the unzipped files into the folder All Tanks.
3. Launch the game. Enter Options > Common Battle Settings > Use alternative sight grid and choose SOP2_bestupid_eng or SOP2_bestupid_ru. Repeat 3rd step choosing all tanks one by one in hangar to set the sight to every tank.
4. Enjoy!

If the Usersights folder is not displ...

Most minimalistic sight for all tanks

#sight#alltanks#all_tanks

#gunsight #sight #m50 #ontos #us_m50_ontos

Small adjustment to the sight made by @TheGun31

I changed the numbers at the end of diagonals to correspond to the number of remaining shells

For instructions, see the original post: https://live.warthunder.com/post/675236/en/

SEMI HISTORICAL USA RANK 1 TO 3 PACK
Tested on 1080p only

This took way longer than I wanted it to, but here it finally is.

IMPORTANT Measurements aren’t in yards, instead I took the measurements and made it directly meters. So 400 yards in a manual/document is 400 meters in my sight.

The pack features all of the tanks in the USA ground tree from rank 1 to rank 3.
Only tanks missing are the ones where we don't know the reticle, for example, M22.
Certain shells such as APCR and Smoke aren't included, since I personally don't see much use in them.

Sourc...
made for most visibility on tank sights and easy spaa since default grid is too thick to see some planes and helicopterrs that are over 14000yds
